# Host Your Next Event or Group Dining Experience at Time Out Market New York

At Time Out Market New York, we offer flexible, stylish event spaces at our iconic location in Brooklyn - perfect for everything from corporate events and birthday parties to rooftop happy hours and large group buyouts.

Welcome to Time Out Market New York — where the best of the city comes together under one roof. Whether you're planning a lively celebration, a corporate gathering, or a private event to remember, our unique venue offers a vibrant atmosphere, sweeping views of the Brooklyn Bridge, and an unforgettable culinary experience curated by New York’s top chefs and mixologists. Our dedicated events team is here to tailor every detail, making your large group or private event seamless, stylish, and distinctly New York.

You'll find our Market on the 1st and 5th floors of our building, over 24,000-square-feet. We can accommodate groups big and small – from a 10-person dinner up to a 350-person cocktail event. We’re happy to reserve tables for your crew, rope off a semi-private area, or book you a section of our patio, rooftop or terrace. Take a tour of our spaces through our 360 Virtual Tour [here](https://app.cloudpano.com/tours/0qiSs9dPJ?sceneId=rgHwvZYwy4).

The best part of booking your event at Time Out Market New York is the opportunity to indulge in our collection of culinary talent. Our signature Event Cards allow your guests to access our incredible lineup of top local chefs at their own pace, but if you’re looking for a more formal feel, our team of hospitality experts can customize an experience specifically for your group.

Been there, done that? Think again, my friend.

![Loading animation](/static/images/loading_icon.gif)
